homepage.title: Ludaro.de Wiki
homepage.subtitle: Learn FiveM Lua for Everyone!
feature.easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
feature.easyToUse.description: The Ludaro Wiki is designed to be accessible by anyone, enabling anyone to learn something new without prior knowledge!
feature.openSource.title: Open-Source
feature.openSource.description: Ludaro Wiki is an open-source project, meaning it can be edited by anyone — including you! Just click the 'Edit' button to start making changes!
feature.community.title: Community
feature.community.description: On our Discord (https://discord.ludaro.de) you'll always find people ready to help you! Whether you have questions or just want to chat, we're here for you!
